text: Tony Zarrindast ( also known as Mohammad Zarrindast) was an Iranian American film producer, film director and cinema actor. He was considered by some as the "Persian Ed Wood". His 1996 film Werewolf was featured on an episode of Mystery Science Theater 3000. Zarrindast graduated from University of California, Los Angeles in the field of cinema. His brother was Alireza Zarrindast. On November 29, 2016 he died from cancer. ==Notes== ==External links== * * Mohammad Zarrindast in Internet database of Soureh Cinema Category:Iranian male film actors Category:Iranian Azerbaijani actors Category:Iranian male stage actors Category:UCLA Film School alumni Category:Iranian male television actors Category:People from Tabriz Category:American people of Azerbaijani descent Category:Iranian Azerbaijani film directors Category:Iranian film producers Category:Iranian emigrants to the United States Category:1934 births Category:2016 deaths
title: Tony Zarrindast
